Heli Crash

Followed the “Applied Houdini – Rigids III” course, made by Steven Knipping. You can find this really great course that teaches a lot about the hard and cone twist constraint over at CGCircuit: www.cgcircuit.com/course/applied-houdini—rigids-iii.
